**NetHack 3.6.7** is the 37th public release of [NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack"). It was released on February 16, 2023. This release fixes a security vulnerability that existed in versions [3.6.2](/wiki/3.6.2 "3.6.2") through [3.6.6](/wiki/3.6.6 "3.6.6"), as well as some more minor bugs. There were no new gameplay features.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Availability](#Availability)
- [2 Online Play](#Online_Play)
- [3 Significant changes](#Significant_changes)
- [4 References](#References)

## Availability

NetHack 3.6.7 is [available](https://nethack.org/v367/downloads.html) from the official NetHack website.

## Online Play

[NAO](/wiki/NAO "NAO") offers NetHack 3.6.7 for online play.

## Significant changes

**This release fixes [CVE-2023-24809](/wiki/Security#CVE-2023-24809 "Security").**[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

There were some other fixes[\[3\]](#cite_note-3):

- during engraving, spaces were counted instead of non-space (cherry-pick of [commit 4e0a1e04](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/4e0a1e04) from NetHack-3.7)

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) <https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6/doc/fixes36.7>
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) <https://nethack.org/security/CVE-2023-24809.html>
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) <https://nethack.org/v367/release.html>

NetHack 3.6.7 is the 37th public release of NetHack. It was released on February 16, 2023. This release fixes a security vulnerability that existed in versions 3.6.2 through 3.6.6, as well as some more minor bugs. There were no new gameplay features.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Availability
  • 2 Online Play
  • 3 Significant changes
  • 4 References

Availability

NetHack 3.6.7 is available from the official NetHack website.

Online Play

NAO offers NetHack 3.6.7 for online play.

Significant changes

This release fixes CVE-2023-24809.[2]

There were some other fixes[3]:

  • during engraving, spaces were counted instead of non-space (cherry-pick of commit 4e0a1e04 from NetHack-3.7)

References

  1. ↑ https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6/doc/fixes36.7
  2. ↑ https://nethack.org/security/CVE-2023-24809.html
  3. ↑ https://nethack.org/v367/release.html
